recipes.label: Into The Abyss
recipes.startdescription: Below us lies a fathomless expanse of freezing darkness and suffocating pressure. To here we must venture forth. We can approach this with the wayfaring Knock or the stoic Winter.

recipes.label: A Piercing Path
recipes.startdescription: The depths may be dark and empty, but so am I. I am an empty vessel to be filled, no different from the void outside my tank. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: A Guided Path
recipes.startdescription: The depths may be dark and empty, but I will not be alone. I will be open to all experiences and beings here. I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: A Barren Path
recipes.startdescription: The depths are dark and lonely, but I will not be blinded. With open eyes I peer into open emptyness. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: An Unmarred Demeanor
recipes.startdescription: As I sink down, I crystalise as the darkness overtakes me and the pressure rises. I will likely succeed.

recipes.label: A Steady Demeanor
recipes.startdescription: As I sink down, I settle into myself as the light fades and the temperature drops. I may yet succeed.
